law.text: In case of an epizootic of such character as to necessitate the destruction of property or materials to prevent the spread of disease, the property or materials shall be destroyed and indemnities paid as provided for in KRS 257.110, 257.120, 257.140, and 257.150.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 12, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 63c-7.
